name: Sorel Out N About Plus Waterproof Boots - Women's
categories: Out N About Plus Waterproof Boots
description: You have places to go and people to see – don’t let a little weather shut you down. With full-grain leather up top, these waterproof boots blend into city situations and keep your toes dry. Wear the Out N About Plus Boots with jeans on puddle-filled trails, or with tights for your daily commute. Unlike a tall pair of boots, they fit neatly into your gym locker.Uppers are durable, waterproof full-grain leather.Seam-sealed waterproof construction.Removable moulded EVA foam footbed with a textile top-cover.Vulcanized rubber shell with herringbone outsoles to gracefully step through puddles.Shaft height is 12.7cm.
